Package main

Class Actions

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Actions
  • public class Actions
extends java.lang.Object
    This is where all player actions and game actions in the game are stored and called. Is a constructor for the actions object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor Description
      Actions​(Crew ship)
      This is where all player actions and game actions in the game are stored and called.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Actions

        public Actions​(Crew ship)
        This is where all player actions and game actions in the game are stored and called. Is a constructor for the actions object.
        Parameters:
        ship - The crew actions are to be performed on

    • Method Detail

      • searchPlanet

        public java.lang.String searchPlanet​(CrewMember member,
                                     Crew ship,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Planet> planets)
        The crew member will search the current planet indicated in the crew variable planet index Has 20% chance to find one of the following: Random food item, Random Medical item, a ship part, random amount of money or nothing. If the crew member is an explorer has 100% chance to find something as opposed to 80%
        Parameters:
        member - The crew member that does the exploration
        ship - The crew the explorer is from
        planets - The list of planets in the solar system
        Returns:
        no action left if the chosen crew member has no remaining actions else returns what was found

      • eat

        public java.lang.String eat​(CrewMember member,
                            Crew ship,
                            FoodItem meal)
        The given crew member will eat the given food changing his status depending on what is eaten. If the crew member is a chef receive double value from the food
        Parameters:
        member - The crew member that will eat
        ship - The ship the crew member is from
        meal - The food item the crew member will eat
        Returns:
        Returns the which crew member ate what and how hungry he is after doing so

      • medicate

        public java.lang.String medicate​(CrewMember crewMember,
                                 Crew ship,
                                 MedicalItem useMedicine)
        The given crew member will use the given medications healing him based on the healing value of the medicine. And the used medicine will be removed from the inventory If a plague heal is used it also cures the member of the space plague.
        Parameters:
        crewMember - The crew member that will receive healing
        ship - The crew the crew member is from
        useMedicine - The medical item the crew member will use
        Returns:
        Return which crew member took which medicine and the affect it had

      • endDay

        public java.lang.String endDay​(Crew ship)
        Reduces the day counter by one, calls updateScore. Has chance for space pirates or space plague to infect the ship. Resets all crew members actions remaining back to 2.
        Parameters:
        ship - The crew
        Returns:

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore​(Crew ship)
        Updates the score based on the hunger, tiredness and health values of each of the crew members
        Parameters:
        ship - The crew

      • sleep

        public java.lang.String sleep​(CrewMember crewMember)
        Puts a crew member to sleep refilling the tiredness variable back to full
        Parameters:
        crewMember - The crew member to sleep
        Returns:
        Return how rested the crew member is

      • repairShip

        public java.lang.String repairShip​(CrewMember crewMember,
                                   Crew ship)
        The given crew member is told to repair the given ship. If the crew member is an engineer repair to full
        Parameters:
        crewMember - The crew member to repair the ship
        ship - The ship to be repaired
        Returns:
        Return who repaired the ship

      • alienPirates

        public java.lang.String alienPirates​(Crew ship)
        This is called from the end day method with a 10% chance of occurring. A random item from either the medicine or food list is stolen.
        Parameters:
        ship - The crew to be robbed
        Returns:
        Returns what was stolen

      • infectSpacePlague

        public java.lang.String infectSpacePlague​(Crew ship)
        Has a 10% chance to be called from end day method. A random crew member from the crew who doesn't already have space plague is infected with the space plague.
        Parameters:
        ship - The crew to be infected with the space plague
        Returns:
        Returns which crew member was given the space plague

      • spacePlagueSymptom

        public java.lang.String spacePlagueSymptom​(Crew ship)
        The symptoms of the space plague are performed here. Everyday everyone with the space plague loses 10 health
        Parameters:
        ship - The crew to suffer symptoms of the space plague
        Returns:
        Returns the crew members afflicted by the space plague

      • flyShip

        public java.lang.String flyShip​(Crew ship,
                                CrewMember firstCrew,
                                CrewMember secondCrew)
        Takes two crew members and flys ship. If no Captains aboard ship may take damage from aesteroids
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship to fly
        firstCrew - the pilot
        secondCrew - th co-pilot
        Returns:

      • asteroidBelt

        public java.lang.String asteroidBelt​(Crew ship)
        Random chance to occur when piloting the ship bewtween planets. The ship loses 10% of current health
        Parameters:
        ship - The crew/ ship to receive asteroid damage
